typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	ProcessName as string
}
source(output(
		Fund_ID as string,
		Fund_Name as string,
		Fund_Master as string,
		Fund_master_Name as string,
		Fund_ABN as string,
		Fund_ARSN as string,
		Fund_Country as string,
		Fund_Region as string,
		Fund_State as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> StagingDB
source(output(
		Fund_ID as string,
		Fund_Name as string,
		Fund_Master as string,
		Fund_master_Name as string,
		Fund_ABN as string,
		Fund_ARSN as string,
		Fund_Country as string,
		Fund_Region as string,
		Fund_State as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [Fund_ID]\n      ,[Fund_Name]\n      ,[Fund_Master]\n      ,[Fund_master_Name]\n      ,[Fund_ABN]\n      ,[Fund_ARSN]\n      ,[Fund_Country]\n      ,[Fund_Region]\n      ,[Fund_State]\n  FROM [relational].[Fund]\n  WHERE [record_deleted_flag] = 1',
	format: 'query',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> RelationDB
StagingDB derive(StagingChecksum = sha2(256, Fund_ID,Fund_Name,Fund_Master,Fund_master_Name,Fund_ABN,Fund_ARSN,Fund_Country,Fund_Region,Fund_State),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> StatgingAddChecksum
StatgingAddChecksum, RelationRenameColumns lookup(Fund_ID == Relation_Fund_ID
	&& Fund_Master == Relation_Fund_Master,
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupRelationalStream
RelationDB derive(RelationalChecksum = sha2(256, Fund_ID,Fund_Name,Fund_Master,Fund_master_Name,Fund_ABN,Fund_ARSN,Fund_Country,Fund_Region,Fund_State),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> RelationalAddChecksum
LookupRelationalStream split(isNull(Relation_RelationalChecksum),
	disjoint: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@(StagingNewRow, RelationExpireRow)
RelationalAddChecksum select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID,
		Relation_Fund_Name = Fund_Name,
		Relation_Fund_Master = Fund_Master,
		Relation_Fund_master_Name = Fund_master_Name,
		Relation_Fund_ABN = Fund_ABN,
		Relation_Fund_ARSN = Fund_ARSN,
		Relation_Fund_Country = Fund_Country,
		Relation_Fund_Region = Fund_Region,
		Relation_Fund_State = Fund_State,
		Relation_RelationalChecksum = RelationalChecksum
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RelationRenameColumns
ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@StagingNewRow select(mapColumn(
		Fund_ID = Relation_Fund_ID,
		Fund_Name = Relation_Fund_Name,
		Fund_Master = Relation_Fund_Master,
		Fund_master_Name = Relation_Fund_master_Name,
		Fund_ABN = Relation_Fund_ABN,
		Fund_ARSN = Relation_Fund_ARSN,
		Fund_Country = Relation_Fund_Country,
		Fund_Region = Relation_Fund_Region,
		Fund_State = Relation_Fund_State
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectNewStagingRow
SelectNewStagingRow derive(start_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		end_datetime = toTimestamp('2999-12-31 00:00:00'),
		record_deleted_flag = toInteger(0),
		process_name = $ProcessName,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> AddAuditColumns
AddAuditColumns alterRow(insertIf(1 == 1)) ~> AlterRowInsertNewRow
AlterRowInsertNewRow sink(input(
		Fund_ID as string,
		Fund_Name as string,
		Fund_Master as string,
		Fund_master_Name as string,
		Fund_ABN as string,
		Fund_ARSN as string,
		Fund_Country as string,
		Fund_Region as string,
		Fund_State as string,
		start_datetime as timestamp,
		end_datetime as timestamp,
		record_deleted_flag as integer,
		process_name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Fund_ID,
		Fund_Name,
		Fund_Master,
		Fund_master_Name,
		Fund_ABN,
		Fund_ARSN,
		Fund_Country,
		Fund_Region,
		Fund_State,
		start_datetime,
		end_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag,
		process_name
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> InsertNewRow
